about

lastlog.de/blog is a collection of articles/experiments from joachim schiele. pankat is used for content creation and all articles are written using markdown syntax with custom extensions.

for me it is important to not depend on a third party for hosting or content creation.

author

joachim schiele, see curriculum vitae

language advice

  • most things are written case insensitive [comp.], that means: written using small letters
  • abbrevations with case, example: HTTP

legal

  • all text is under the terms of the GNU Free Documentation License 1.2
  • individual articles or elements used in an article might be licensed differently

about pankat

pankat is a static blog generator written in go used for this blog:

navigating the articles

  • use the left and right key on the keyboard to go back and forth in the articles.
  • most recent article link
  • timeline all postings timeline with tags/series filter
